<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
SOCIAL_SHOWCASE_CONTENT: {
    type: string;

                attrs: {
                    id: string;
                    label: string;
                    name: string;
                    href: string;
                    role: string;
                };
            }[];

            type: string;
            text: string;
            marks?: undefined;
        })[];

        type: string;

            type: string;

}
```
